description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You've been abducted by aliens who are conducting tests on you to determine whether or not they should invade Earth.  Can you perform well enough to frighten them into changing their plans?  Or do they have something else in mind?
description.short: You've been abducted by aliens who are conducting tests on you to determine whether or not they should invade Earth.  Can you perform well enough to frighten them into changing their plans?  Or do they have something else in mind?
